articles.title: Kim Jong Un Greets Syrian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Greets Syrian President
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Bashar Al-Assad, regional secretary of the Baath Arab Socialist Party and president of the Syrian Arab Republic.
					 The message said:
					
					 Please accept my warm congratulations to you, the Baath Arab Socialist Party and the friendly government and people of Syria on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of the March 8 revolution in Syria.
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I reiterate our support and solidarity with the efforts of your party, government and people to defend the country's sovereignty, security and stability and wish you good health and happiness and success in your responsible work.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Syrian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Syrian President
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Syrian President Bashar Al-Assad on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of the March 8 revolution in Syria.
					 The message wished the Syrian president success in his work for defending the country's peace, stability and security, expressing belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Sends Congratulations to President-elect of Russia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Sends Congratulations to President-elect of Russia
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, president-elect of Russia.
					 Kim in the message said that his election as president of the Russian Federation is a manifestation of the Russian people's trust and support for him.
					
					 He wished him success in his responsible work as president, expressing belief that the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation would continue to develop favorably in the future, too.

articles.title: Officials of Ministries and National Institutions of DPRK Call for Crushing Lee Myung Bak Group
articles.content:
Officials of Ministries and National Institutions of DPRK Call for Crushing Lee Myung Bak Group 
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Officials of ministries and national institutions of the DPRK strongly assert that the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors should be hung on gibbet for perpetrating thrice-cursed crimes.
					 Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, branded traitor Lee Myung Bak as an idiot going reckless like a puppy knowing no fear of a tiger. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The great men of Mt. Paektu are universally recognized prominent leaders as they performed great exploits on behalf of the country and its people, era and history.
					
					 The past history records the Yusin dictator ill-famed for confrontation with compatriots and military fascist man-killers who made people shudder.
					
					 But they dared not to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 I cannot repress my indignation at the human scum that dared shake their fists towards the Heaven though they have prolonged their remaining days, backed by outside forces.
					
					 Mun Jae Chol, deputy general director of the General Bureau of Diplomatic Corps Affairs of the DPRK, expressed his towering resentment at the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors hell-bent on confrontation with compatriots.
					
					 He said: The puppet group of traitors openly revealed its true colors as a group of hooligans that put the successive fascist maniacs into the shade.
					
					 The confrontation hysteria of the human scum reminds one of mad dogs. Their fate has already been sealed.
					
					 It is the best option to beat the mad dogs to death in good time. If they are allowed to run wild any longer, they will bring only disasters.
					
					 Rim Sung Chol, department director of the Ministry of Coal Industry, called for making a clean sweep of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors, human scum.
					
					 He went on to say:
					
					There is a limit to our patience.
					
					 How can we endure ourselves now that the dignity of our supreme leadership which we regard dearer than our own lives has been hurt.
					
					 Now is the time to bring the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to justice as it committed such hideous crimes, bereft of any elementary etiquette and morality.
					
					 The world will clearly realize the unshakable faith of all service personnel and people of the DPRK who allow neither deviation nor compromise over the issue of devotedly defending the leader.

articles.title: Workers Vow to Wipe out Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors
articles.content:
Workers Vow to Wipe out Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- A meeting of workers and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea took place outside the House of Class Education in Susan-ri, Kangso District, Wednesday to vow to wipe out the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors.  
					 Attending it were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, officials and members of the trade unions, working people in Nampho City.
					
					 The statement issued by a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army was read out to be followed by speeches at the meeting.
					
					 The speakers bitterly denounced the group of traitors for perpetrating such hideous provocation as hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, not content with rubbing salt into the wounds of the people in the bitterest grief over the loss of the father of the nation and staging war drills.
					
					 The compatriots cannot live under the same sky with the group of traitors who committed such high treason, they said, adding: 
					
					 Those who hurt the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership even a bit will find no breathing spell in the world.
					
					 No matter how reckless the traitors may go, they cannot do any harm to the great dignified idea and social system in the DPRK.
					
					 The workers and members of the trade unions will resolutely protect the authority of the great men of Mt. Paektu, a symbol of the dignity and invincibility of Songun Korea and an eternal mental mainstay of the Sun's nation, and devotedly defend the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They vowed to bring about great innovations and leap forward in building a thriving nation in the spirit of wiping out the group of traitors hell-bent on the confrontation with compatriots.

articles.title: Rallies Held in Jagang Province and Rason City
articles.content:
Rallies Held in Jagang Province and Rason City
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons and people in Jagang Province and Rason City held rallies on Wednesday to vow to destroy the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors through a merciless sacred war.
					 The statement of a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army was read out to be followed by speeches at the rallies.
					
					 The floor was taken by the chief secretaries of the Provincial and City Party Committees of the Workers' Party of Korea, officers of the Korean People's Army, members of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards and youth and students.
					
					 The speakers said that they would wage an indiscriminate sacred war of our style till traitor Lee Myung Bak and the military warmongers are punished in the name of the nation.
					
					 They said that servicepersons and the people are pledging to turn out in the sacred war to annihilate the enemies, the Lee group of traitors, who defamed the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, through the merciless all-people war of retaliation.
					
					 The hysteric act kicked off by the Lee group of traitors who lack political view and vulgar in morality amounts to an undisguised head-on challenge and new declaration of a war against the DPRK, they said.
					
					 No matter how reckless the thrice-cursed traitors may go on the rampage, they cannot do any harm to the great dignified idea and social system in the DPRK, the speakers added.
					
					 They called upon the party members, working people and youth and students, who have grown up to be fighters for devotedly defending the leader in the Songun revolution, to join servicepersons in mercilessly wiping out war maniacs and build a thriving nation that will shine with the great august name of the sun.
					
					 Then there was a demonstration march after the rally in Jagang Province.

articles.title: DPRK People Vow Revenge on S. Korean Regime
articles.content:
DPRK People Vow Revenge on S. Korean Regime
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The servicepersons and civilians of the DPRK vow revenge on south Korea's Lee Myung Bak regime which did harm to the dignity of their supreme leadership.
					 Kim Hyong Ryong, commander of the 2nd Corps of the Korean People's Army, told KCNA:
					
					 "Not content with the powder-reeking war drills against the DPRK, the Lee group of human dregs committed the never-to-be-condoned high treasons.
					
					 This hideous provocation pushed our servicepersons into an uncontrollable fury, and they are now thirsting for revenge.
					
					 Our-style sacred war based on physical attack will bring to a definite end all the acts of the traitors to insult the dignity of our supreme leadership, and our armed forces will wipe out all of them to the last man."
					
					 Ri Yong Chol, first secretary of the C.C., Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, said:
					
					 "How can we repress our wrath at the Lee group of hooligans bereft of elementary morality?
					
					 We will bring an unparalleled traitor Lee Myung Bak and his lackeys to justice. This is the fixed will of the five million young people in the DPRK."
					
					 Kang Ji Yong, director of the Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea, said:
					
					 "The Lee group of gangsters will never find a breathing spell in this land and sky. We will surely force it to pay dearly for its high treasons.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK do not make empty words."

articles.title: Masses for National Reunification Held on Nirvana Day
articles.content:
Masses for National Reunification Held on Nirvana Day
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- "Masses praying for national reunification on nirvana day" simultaneously took place in temples across the DPRK Wednesday.
					 Attending them were office-bearers of the Central Committee and provincial, city and county committees of the Buddhist Federation of Korea, monks of temples and believers.
					
					 A ritual was made to be followed by speeches. A prayer for national reunification was read out.
					
					 They said that the Koreans have turned out to a general drive to glorify 2012 as a year of shining victory, in which the heyday for prosperity is unfolding, true to the instructions of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They called on all the Buddhists at home and abroad to maintain the stand of achieving national independence and giving priority to the nation and bring about national reconciliation and unity as required by the June 15 era of reunification under the uplifted banner of "Let all the compatriots open the gates of national reunification full of fresh confidence!" 
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities made reckless provocations against the north despite its consistent efforts for peace on the Korean Peninsula, pushing the situation to the worst war phase.
					
					 They called on all the Buddhists to take an active part in the practical actions to foil the war moves of warmongers at home and abroad. They also called for working hard for independent reunification of the country, peace and national prosperity true to the Buddhist canon on reconciliation, harmony, peace and equality, and prayed for the earlier realization of paradise in which the idea of getting rid of pain and attaining happiness has come true.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses Japanese Reactionaries' Moves for Overseas Expansion
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses Japanese Reactionaries' Moves for Overseas Expansion 
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Recently the Japanese reactionaries requested the U.S. to comply with the price of fighters "F-35" and the date of their delivery.
					 Rodong Sinmun on Wednesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard: Japan, still harboring its old dream of "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere", is keen to equip its air "self-defense force" with the said fighters and dramatically bolster up its operational capability. This is based on its judgment that it cannot do anything without the U.S. backing.
					
					 The reason for Japan's above-said judgment can be explained by the fact that Japan considers it as the only way for achieving its objective as the Asian people are opposed to its moves to emerge a military giant, the commentary notes.
					
					 Drawing attention to the fact that Japan is attaching importance to the U.S.-Japan joint military exercises outside its territory under the pretext of "security," the commentary observes that its ulterior intention is to launch its overseas aggression in real earnest, backed by the U.S.
					
					  There is no guarantee that Japan would not go over to dangerous overseas military operations, pursuant to the new defense strategy of the U.S. which attaches importance to the Asia-Pacific region with main emphasis on the Korean Peninsula, concludes the commentary.

articles.title: South Korean Authorities' Rhetoric to Evade Responsibility for Prevailing Situation Snubbed
articles.content:
South Korean Authorities' Rhetoric to Evade Responsibility for Prevailing Situation Snubbed
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, a spokesman for the puppet Ministry of Defense of south Korea made provocative remarks that "it would not react to every move of the north" and "it urges the north to stop mud-slinging." A spokesman for the puppet Ministry of Unification echoed his call for "an end to the mud-slinging".
					 Meanwhile, some conservative media of south Korea are busy floating extremely disturbing stories that the north's intensified smear campaign against the south is a strategy for engaging the U.S. and blocking south Korea and it is aimed to spark off conflicts in south Korea with the general election at hand.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 No matter how many times the Lee Myung Bak group bends its knees before the nation and makes an apology to it for its thrice-cursed act of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, it will never feel relieved.
					
					 But the group described the actions taken by the DPRK as "mud-slinging", far from making any apology. This reminds one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 It is unimaginable for the DPRK to overlook the above-said most hideous provocations. If people of south Korea denounce the conservative authorities for the above-said case, that is its internal affair from A to Z.
					
					 As far as the issue of "conflicts in south Korea" with the "general election" at hand is concerned, the puppet group is to blame for all disturbances there. Because it was none other than the Lee group that created "a security crisis" by orchestrating the provocations in the run-up to the general election in a bid to rally conservative forces and turn the "election" situation in its favor.
					
					 The Lee group would be well advised to stop playing sleight of hand.
					
					  It should bear in mind that its desperate efforts to evade the responsibility for the situation would only add to its crimes.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams Japanese Reactionaries' Repressive Campaign against Chongryon
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams Japanese Reactionaries' Repressive Campaign against Chongryon 
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- On February 28 the Japanese reactionaries hurled armed police into brigandish search operations against the offices of the Korean Scientists and Technologists Association in Japan and the Korean Amateur Athletes Federation in Japan housed in the Korean Press Hall of Chongryon (General Association of Koreans in Japan), the Itabashi Branch of Tokyo Metropolis of Chongryon and the Chugai Travel Agency under Chongryon.
					 In the course of investigation the security authorities confiscated notebooks and memory of the managing director of the Korean Amateur Athletes Federation, a computer of its vice-chairman and a computer server of the travel agency.
					
					 They strictly searched offices of other organizations there and took pictures there under the pretext of verifying the hall. 
					
					 Minju Joson Wednesday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is absolutely intolerable as this was another politically motivated repressive campaign of the Japanese reactionaries against Chongryon. 
					
					 Chongryon has protected the national rights and interests of the Koreans in Japan and waged a vigorous patriotic movement for the homeland and the nation in an alien land, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Such activities of Chongryon are fair and not contrary to the Japanese law.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that such anti-DPRK, anti-Chongryon campaign is getting more undisguised than ever before, timed to coincide with the moves of the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak group to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK and their racket for a war against it.
					
					 The Korean people are greatly infuriated by the rash acts of the Japanese reactionaries to stamp out Chongryon, not content with the false propaganda conducted by them against the DPRK overtly and covertly in league with the U.S. imperialists and the Lee group even after the great loss to the nation.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries would be well advised to properly understand the Korean people's towering hatred toward Japan and behave themselves.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Nation-wide Sacred War to Wipe out Traitors of S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Nation-wide Sacred War to Wipe out Traitors of S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- All Koreans at home and abroad should turn out in a just patriotic sacred war to severely punish the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in the name of the era and history and realize the historic cherished desire for national reunification, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a bylined article. 
					 The recent hideous provocation perpetrated by a puppet army unit in Inchon was an unpardonable insult to the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The crimes committed by the Lee group of traitors were the worst treachery as they threatened the lives of all Koreans.
					
					 As long as the traitors engrossed in all sorts of wrongdoings against the nation are allowed to go scot-free, they will put the nation's very existence at peril.
					
					 Koreans have waged a strenuous struggle for peace and peaceful reunification. It is a bounden national duty for them to turn out in the patriotic sacred war to wipe out those hell-bent on the moves to provoke a war against peace. 
					
					 If the hideous provocations committed by the Lee group are tolerated, the country's reunification, the cherished desire of the Koreans, will never come true.

articles.title: Actions to Judge Traitorous Regime Declared
articles.content:
Actions to Judge Traitorous Regime Declared 
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Organizations of various circles of south Korea including Ssangryong Motors held a meeting in Kyonggi Province on March 4 declaring the start of their actions against the authorities' policy against the workers.
					 Speakers at the meeting recalled that the workers of the above-said plant have conducted actions in demand of the lifting of the unreasonable lay-off since 2009.
					
					 Nevertheless, the authorities and its management side have still sidestepped a solution to the problem, they noted.
					
					 There is nothing to expect from the present "government" and the management side, they said, declaring that they would judge the treacherous regime in the forthcoming elections without fail.

articles.title: Painting Ridiculing Lee Myung Bak Displayed in Heart of Seoul
articles.content:
Painting Ridiculing Lee Myung Bak Displayed in Heart of Seoul
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- A painting disclosing the crimes committed by traitor Lee Myung Bak was recently pasted at a bus stop in Jongro crossroads, Seoul, sparking off sensation, according to Hankuk Ilbo of south Korea.
					 The painting depicted Lee Myung Bak in a Nazi military uniform and cap on his head, his fist clenched. 
					
					 A shovel drawn on his tie means he is digging earth and "G" written on the band of his left arm derides him as a rat. 
					
					 The painting showed Lee's mouth full of dirty foam. It may be foam Lee used to show whenever he made unspeakable reckless remarks against the nation and reunification. Or may it be saliva reminiscent of his avarice as he used to spit, when seeing money like a hungry animal before a pray. Or it may be saliva betraying his despair as he is on the deathbed.  
					
					 It was said the painting was seen displayed in other places all day long.
					
					 Watching the painting, many people spat at it in token of their resentment. 
					
					 A lot of articles ridiculing Lee Myung Bak have been posted on Internet, becoming topic of discussion. Among them are "This recalls late in Ri Dynasty when people had something to complain to the king, they used to paste wall papers at night by stealth", "Think more of why such painting was displayed rather than frantically searching for the man who did so", "I am covetous of the painting. If I steal that masterpiece, will I be arrested for theft?" and "A drawing of a rat was worth 1 700 U.S. dollars. How much this painting will cost?"
					
					 As for the said drawing of a rat, a professor of a south Korean university drew it deriding Lee in literature introducing an international meeting held in Seoul in 2010. At that time the puppet court imposed upon him a fine of 1,700 U.S. dollars.
					
					 A book describing Lee Myung Bak as a "vexing rat" is popular in south Korea these days.
					
					 It was said that there took place a meeting at which its participants had an event of drawing paintings satirizing Lee and most of them drew rats. Its participants had a "game of catching rat Myung Bak," shouting "Let's catch Myung Bak who squeaks, squeaks, squeaks."
					
					 An "anti-rat expedition" was organized among south Koreans, "prayer for cursed rat" is becoming popular and shouts of slogans "Send the rat to gutter" and "catch the rat in Chongwadae" are heard in south Korea. This vividly manifests the towering grudge and hatred against traitor Lee.
					
					 The above-said developments in Seoul at a time when citizens out in protest against the FTA are burning Lee's photos and holding his funeral ceremony clearly indicate what phase the wrath of the south Korean people against Lee has reached.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Slam S. Korean Authorities' Heinous Provocation
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Slam S. Korean Authorities' Heinous Provocation 
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Kang Chu Ryon, chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, issued a statement Monday condemning the south Korean group of traitors for their unpardonable provocation against the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership.
					 The south Korean puppet authorities launched the joint war drills in collusion with the brigandish U.S. imperialists, availing themselves of the mourning period in the DPRK, and even committed the crime of insulting the dignity of its supreme leadership. This is enough to make the Korean people tremble with anger, the statement said.
					
					 The group of traitors not only eroded the spirit of the June 15 declaration, bringing a touch-and-go situation to the Korean peninsula but committed heinous anti-national, anti-DPRK confrontation act of insulting the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership, the statement pointed out.
					
					 Traitor Lee Myung Bak is a sworn enemy with whom the Koreans can not live under the same sky.
					
					 The statement strongly urged the Lee group to kneel before the nation and promise not to hurt the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership even a bit again.

articles.title: Korean Youths In Japan Denounce Lee Group of Traitors
articles.content:
Korean Youths In Japan Denounce Lee Group of Traitors
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- A meeting of Korean youths in Japan was held in Tokyo on Tuesday to denounce the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for its high treason.
					 Present there were Pak Ku Ho, vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, Kim Hong Chol, director of the General Affairs Department, officials of the Korean Youth League, the Korean Youth Commercial Association and the Korean Students Union in Japan and other youth organizations and young Koreans.
					
					 The statement of the spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army was read out to be followed by speeches.
					
					 Taking the floor were Kim Cha Dol, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, Sin Thae Hwa, director of the General Affairs Department of the Tokyo Headquarters of the Youth League and Ri Tong Ho, chairman of the Committee for the Choson Sinbo Company of the League.
					
					 They denounced the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for having plunged the north-south relations into the worst phase during the past four years of office and created the touch-and-go situation, availing itself of the mourning period in the DPRK. Not content with this, it committed the thrice-cursed treason of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, they added.
					
					 They said that it is the firm faith and moral obligation of the Korean youths in Japan to uphold General Secretary Kim Jong Il as the benefactor of their lives and benevolent father forever. The dear respected Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the nation, represents their whole life, they added.
					
					 They called for immediately wiping out the Lee Myung Bak group, made up of villains, traitors to the nation and war maniacs, on behalf of the whole nation.
					
					 They called upon the youths to stand in the van of the drive to strengthen the single-minded unity of the Chongryon ranks as firm as a rock and spur the patriotic movement, thus providing a springboard for ushering in a new golden age.

articles.title: Korean Teachers in Japan Condemn Lee Myung Bak for Thrice-cursed Crimes
articles.content:
Korean Teachers in Japan Condemn Lee Myung Bak for Thrice-cursed Crimes
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Jo Han Ju, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Teachers and School Clerks in Japan released a statement representing the towering resentment and wrath at the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors on Monday. 
					The statement warned that the group of traitors will have to pay dearly and not be able to evade the fate of forlorn wandering spirit.
					
					 The statement said no case will be graver than this as the Lee group committed such a thrice-cursed crime as hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK whom all the people in the DPRK and the Koreans in Japan believe as in Heaven and entrust their destiny to.
					
					 The statement noted that all the members of the union would strive to achieve the cause of the national reunification with all devotion under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Koreans in China Condemn Lee Myung Bak Group's Hideous Provocations
articles.content:
Koreans in China Condemn Lee Myung Bak Group's Hideous Provocations
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The General Federation of Koreans in China in a statement on March 3 denounced the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for perpetrating such hideous provocation as hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					 The dignity of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu is the life and soul of the Korean nation and dearer than the lives of all Koreans, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					 It is the unshakable determination of the DPRK not to show any mercy for those who defame the dignity of its supreme leadership but deal merciless sledge hammer blows at them wherever they go in this world. 
					
					 The Lee group which committed high treason will find neither place to hide nor breathing spell in this land and it is fated to meet only miserable deaths, warned the statement. 
					
					 The Youth Federation of Korean Nationals in China and the Federation of Korean National Economic Workers in China in their statements on March 4 said:
					
					 The Lee group is utterly ignorant of the Korean people who always remain true to the idea and guidance of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, united as firm as a rock around him, believing and following General Secretary Kim Jong Il as Heaven. 
					
					 The statements evinced their determination to make a clean sweep of the Lee group from the arena of history and carry on the struggle to the last to achieve national reconciliation and unity, peace and stability of the country and accomplish the historic cause of national reunification.

articles.title: Peruvian Political Figures Denounce U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
Peruvian Political Figures Denounce U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The chairman and the general secretary of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru separately issued statements on Feb. 28 supporting the statement issued by the spokesman for the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 Chairman Genaro Ledesma Izquieta extended full support to the statement the NDC issued in denunciation of the U.S.-south Korea Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises.
					
					   The statement said:
					
					 The murderous U.S. government restlessly attempts to ignite a war against the DPRK, bringing the world situation to a serious crisis and threatening its peace.
					
					 Having reduced south Korea to their logistic base the U.S. imperialists are zealously instigating the Lee Myung Bak puppet group in a bid to realize their ambition for dominating the world and keep the Korean nation divided indefinitely.
					
					 The DPRK has not invaded anyone but has done everything for the unity of the whole nation.
					
					 It will never tolerate the moves of the Yankee imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces for aggression.
					
					 The People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru vehemently denounces the war drills staged by the U.S. and the south Korean group of traitors, its lackeys, to kill Koreans and other peoples of the world.
					
					 General Secretary Cati Campos said:
					
					The saber-rattling now under way across south Korea is a curtain-raiser to an armed invasion against the DPRK.
					
					 It is, at the same time, an act of chilling the desire of the Korean people and the people of the neighboring countries aspiring after peace and security on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The statement strongly urged the U.S. and the south Korean authorities to immediately stop the war drills against the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by British Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by British Personages
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in UK on Feb. 25 to mark the 70th birth anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the 30th anniversary of his work "On the Juche Idea".
					 Dermot Hudson, chief of the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, praised Kim Jong Il as the people's leader, invincible and iron-willed commander and rare thinker and theoretician.
					
					 Kim Jong Il published his work "On the Juche Idea," in particular, thus comprehensively systematizing the revolutionary ideas of President Kim Il Sung and performing great feats in the fields of ideology and theory, he said.
					
					  A professor at University of London noted that Kim Jong Il developed and enriched the Juche idea as the only guiding idea in the era of independence. The professor explained the originality of the Juche idea.
					
					 Kim Jong Il made a proper clarification of the issue of succeeding to the revolutionary cause, the professor said, adding that supreme leader Kim Jong Un is steadfastly carrying forward the Juche cause and this resulted in a successful solution to the issue of succession to the leadership in the DPRK.
					
					 Shawn Pikford, secretary general of the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, said: Kim Jong Il started his Songun leadership by visiting Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army in 1960. He consistently maintained the Songun politics in the efforts to accomplish the socialist cause. The Songun torch kindled on Mt. Paektu is clearly indicating the road to be followed by the world people aspiring after independence.

articles.title: Russia Rebukes Attempts to Make UNHRC as Tool for Pressure
articles.content:
Russia Rebukes Attempts to Abuse UNHRC as Tool for Pressure
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Gennadi Gatsilov, deputy foreign minister of Russia, in his speech at a recent meeting of the United Nations Human Rights Council, clarified the Russian government's stand of repudiating the attempts to reduce the Council to a tool for political pressure.
					 He said his country is opposed to any attempt to use the Council as a tool for pressure in a bid to classify countries into good states and bad states, students and examiners. 
					
					 The existing problems should be settled in a peaceful manner free from any outside pressure and interference and by the concerted efforts of a nation through national dialogue and common consensus, he said.
					
					 Russia is strongly opposed to outside forces' armed intervention in support of any one party involved in its internal dispute, he noted, adding that one should not allow under any circumstances the acts of abusing the rights of many people and taking the lives of peaceable inhabitants under the pretext of defending human rights.

articles.title: Mexican President Calls for Mutual Cooperation in Anti-drug Struggle
articles.content:
Mexican President Calls for Mutual Cooperation in Anti-drug Struggle 
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Mexican President Felipe Calderon called upon regional countries to cooperate one another in the anti-drug struggle.
					 He stressed the need for regional countries to work together to rout gangs of drug traffickers.
					
					 "In the face of transnational organized crime, we must create an international front where societies and governments are not meeting this challenge alone," he said.

articles.title: Iran Parliament Speaker Accuses U.S. Military of Koran Incineration
articles.content:
Iran Parliament Speaker Accuses U.S. Military of Koran Incineration 
 Tehran, March 7 (KCNA) -- Iranian parliament speaker Ali Larijani on March 3 issued a statement censuring the U.S. military for the recent incineration of the Koran at a U.S. military base in Afghanistan.
					 The statement cited historical facts to reveal barbarity and vulgarity betrayed by the U.S., a self-style proponent of freedom and human rights, by debasing the Islamist faith.
					
					 The Koran is a priceless treasure of Islam, the statement said, adding that the Islamists will never pass over the blasphemy but give a severe punishment to the offenders.

articles.title: Jordanian Trade Unions Condemn Israeli Violations against Holy Sites in Kuds
articles.content:
Jordanian Trade Unions Condemn Israeli Violations against Holy Sites in Kuds
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Jordan's powerful trade unions on Sunday condemned Israeli violations against some sacred Islamic and Christian sites in Kuds, the state-run Petra news agency reported.
					 In a joint statement, the trade unions called on the international community to shoulder its responsibility of defending these holy sites and stop the Israeli aggressions against them.
					
					 Labeling Israelis' acts as stark violations, the trade unions said Israelis' escalation of hostility in Kuds as well as their systematic aggression against the Palestinians would lead to more violence and worsen the situation in the area.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion al presidente sirio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion al presidente sirio
Pyongyang, 7 de marzo (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, envio el dia 7 un mensaje de felicitacion a Bashar al-Assad, secretario regional del Partido Socialista del Resurgimiento Arabe (BAAS) y presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria.
					   El texto sigue:
					
					  Con motivo del 49o aniversario de la Revolucion del 8 de Marzo en Siria, extiendo mis calidas felicitaciones a Vd., el Partido Socialista del Resurgimiento Arabe, el gobierno y pueblo amistosos de Siria.
					
					  Aprovechando esta oportunidad, reafirmo nuestro apoyo y solidaridad a los esfuerzos de su partido, gobierno y pueblo por defender la soberania, la seguridad y la estabilidad del pais y le deseo buena salud y felicidad y exitos en su trabajo responsable.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a Putin
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a Putin
Pyongyang, 7 de marzo (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 6 un mensaje de felicitacion al electo presidente de la Federacion Rusa, Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin.
					El remitente senala en su misiva que la eleccion del destinatario como presidente es una muestra de confianza y apoyo del pueblo ruso a el.
					
					Expresa la conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises continuaran desarrollandose positivamente tambien en el futuro y le desea los exitos en su labor responsable al frente del Estado.

articles.title: Funcionarios publicos abogan por derrotar a Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Funcionarios publicos abogan por derrotar a Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 7 de marzo (ACNC) -- Los funcionarios de ministerios y organos centrales insisten fuertemente en que ejecuten en la horca de la historia a la banda del traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak que cometio el imperdonable crimen de manchar la maxima dignidad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					  Kim Jin Pom, vicepresidente del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, califico al traidor Lee de imbecil que actua locamente como un cachorro que no teme al tigre, y prosiguio:
					
					  Son lideres reconocidos por el mundo los Grandes Hombres sin pares del monte Paektu que realizaron enormes hazanas ante la patria y el pueblo, la epoca y la historia.
					
					  Hubo anteriormente en el Sur de Corea el dictador de "renovacion" que se granjeo mala fama por su campana de confrontacion con los compatriotas del Norte y el gobernante militar fascista que escenifico un bano de sangre.
					
					  Pero, ni ellos se atrevieron a ofender la maxima dignidad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  Las basuras humanas (compinches de Lee), que mantienen su precaria vida bajo la proteccion de las fuerzas extranjeras, fueron los unicos que cometieron esa canallada.
					
					  Sumamente indignado ante la banda del traidor Lee enloquecida por la confrontacion con los compatriotas, Mun Jae Chol, subdirector general de la Direccion General de Servicios al Cuerpo Diplomatico, expreso como sigue:
					
					  La banda de titeres surcoreanos revela su naturaleza de gangster sin precedentes ni entre los fascistas anteriores.
					
					  La ola de confrontacion de esas basuras nos recuerda al perro rabioso. Ellos tienen el destino ya manifiesto.
					
					  Hay que matar a tiempo al perro rabioso con el palazo. 
					
					  Rim Sung Chol, director del Ministerio de Industria Carbonifera subrayo: 
					
					Debemos exterminar a la banda de Lee.
					
					  Nuestra paciencia tambien tiene limite.
					
					  No podemos aguantar mas ya que fue insultada nuestra maxima dignidad mas preciosa que la vida.
					
					  Llego la hora de enjuiciar a la banda del traidor Lee en el banquillo de acusados de la historia.
					
					  El mundo vera claramente la conviccion invariable de todo el ejercito y pueblo que no conocen regateos ni conciliacion en defender al lider a costa de la vida.

articles.title: Efectuado mitin de obreros y miembros gremiales
articles.content:
Efectuado mitin de obreros y miembros gremiales
Pyongyang, 7 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 7 en la explanada frente al pabellon de educacion clasista en la comuna de Susan del municipio de Kangso de la ciudad de Nampho un mitin de los obreros y los miembros de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea (FGSC) para vengarse de la banda del traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak.
					Estuvieron presentes el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae, los funcionarios y otros miembros de la FGSC, los obreros y trabajadores de la citada ciudad.
					
					Se dio lectura a la declaracion del portavoz de la Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea y hubo intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores condenaron la banda de traidores surcoreanos que desarrollaron ejercicios contra los connacionales entristecidos por haber perdido al Padre de la nacion, e insultaron la maxima dignidad de la RPDC.
					
					Aseveraron que no pueden convivir bajo el mismo cielo con ella que cometio tales crimenes y prosiguieron:
					
					Los que calumnian en lo minimo nuestra maxima dignidad no tienen refugio en esta tierra.
					
					Aunque los traidores surcoreanos actuan tan desesperadamente, son firmes nuestra gran idea y prestigioso regimen.
					
					 Todos los obreros y los miembros de la FGSC defenderan a costa de la vida el prestigio de los Grandes Hombres del monte Paektu, simbolo de la dignidad e invenciblidad de Corea del Songun y eterno pilar del alma de la nacion coreana, y el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea encabezado por el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					
					Los oradores juraron registrar gran innovacion y saltos en todos los frentes de la construccion de un Estado prospero con el impetu de enterrar a los traidores, enloquecidos en el enfrentamiento fratricida.

articles.title: Mitines  de militares y civiles en Jagang y Rason
articles.content:
Mitines  de militares y civiles en Jagang y   Rason
Pyongyang, 7 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 7 los mitines de militares y civiles de la provincia de Jagang y la ciudad de Rason para aniquilar a la banda del traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak.
					En las ocasiones se dio lectura a la declaracion del portavoz de la Comandancia Suprema del Ejecito Popular de Corea y pronunciaron discursos los secretarios responsables del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la provincia y la ciudad, los oficiales del EPC, miembros de la Guardia Roja Obrero-Campesina, jovenes y estudiantes.
					
					Los oradores aseveraron que libraran ininterrumpida e indiscriminadamente la sagrada guerra al estilo coreano por acabar en nombre de la nacion con el traidor Lee y los belicistas del ejercito titere.
					
					Apuntaron que todos los militares y civiles coreanos se han levantado como un solo hombre en la batalla de venganza de todo el pueblo por exterminar sin piedad a la horda del traidor Lee que insulto la maxima dignidad de la RPDC, y prosiguieron:
					
					La locura histerica de la banda de Lee, ignorante en lo politico y vil en lo moral, deviene el abierto desafio total y nueva declaracion de guerra contra la RPDC.
					
					Aunque los traidores surcoreanos actuan tan desesperadamente como perros rabiosos, son firmes nuestra gran idea y prestigioso regimen.
					
					Los oradores exhortaron a todos los militantes del PTC, trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes, crecidos como fidedignos defensores al lider  en medio de las tempestades de la revolucion del Songun, junto con los oficiales y soldados del EPC a aniquilar implacablemente a los maniacos de guerra y levantar en este territorio un Estado prospero.
					
					En el mitin de militares y civiles efectuado en la provincia de Jagang se desarrollo la manifestacion de condena al traidor Lee.
